overview: A controversial film about Jared (Brad Armstrong), a thirty-something priest at the prime of his life physically, mentally and spiritually. Through his work with the church, Jared has found solitude and spiritual fulfillment through helping others. Enter Grace (Sydnee Steele) a lover from Jared's past, whose unfaithful ways are what lead Jared to the cloth. When Grace shows up on Jared's doorstep after five years, Jared is suddenly plagued with intense sexual desires and fantasies causing him to have to choose between his faith and the woman he once loved. Falling from Grace, believe and you will be shown the way...
tagline: Bless me, Fatherâ€¦for I have sinned.
title: Falling from Grace
